rationale: Contains a calming cue ('at least for now, it’s not an issue') from Q5.
statement_text: This virus [The current H5N1 strain] just is not infecting lower parts of the respiratory tract in humans at this point. Now that [the virus not infecting lower respiratory tract] can all change in a heartbeat with additional mutations. This virus [The current H5N1 strain] just is not infecting lower parts of the respiratory tract in humans at this point. Now that [the virus not infecting lower respiratory tract] can all change in a heartbeat with additional mutations. But at least for now, it [the virus infecting lower respiratory tract]’s not an issue.
